description:
Protect the floor of your MSR Tent and extend the life of your tent, this footprint is designed to better protect your tent from wear-and-tear. Compatible with Hubba Hubba, Freelite 2, Carbon Reflex 2, Access 2 or Thru Hiker Mesh House 2 tents.

  • Sized to fit the floor of the your MSR Tent and designed so it doesn't channel rain underneath
  • Dimensions: 208 x 122cm
name: MSR Universal 2 Regular Footprint
